heroSubtitle: The web is a comprehensive platform for optical management, designed to optimize customer administration, appointments, inventory, and sales. Its goal is to facilitate the daily work of optical staff and improve the patient experience.
contactSubheading: Fill out the form and we'll get back to you as soon as possible
contactSuccessDescription: Thank you for contacting us. We'll respond as soon as possible.
contactErrorDescription: Sorry, there was an error sending your message. Please try again later.

settings.teamLogoDescription: Update your team logo to make it easier to identify
